variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Participant ID submitted to dbGaP

variable.name: race_selfreport
variable.description: Self report race [European American, African American]

variable.name: sex_selfreport
variable.description: Values: Male; Female

variable.name: study_site
variable.description: Study site, field clinic, or center within study

variable.name: age_baseline
variable.description: Age in years at first participant visit

variable.name: bmi_baseline
variable.description: Baseline body mass index (BMI) in kg/m2

variable.name: t2diabetes_baseline
variable.description: Type 2 diabetes (T2D) status at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: weight_baseline
variable.description: Weight in kg. at first participant visit

variable.name: waist_baseline
variable.description: Waist in cm. at first participant visit

variable.name: whr_baseline
variable.description: Waist to hip ratio at first participant visit

variable.name: height_baseline
variable.description: Standing height in cm. at first participant visit

variable.name: ldl_baseline
variable.description: Baseline calculated low density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol in mg/dL (missing where trigs>400)

variable.name: hdl_baseline
variable.description: High density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol level in mg/dL at first participant visit

variable.name: trigs_baseline
variable.description: Triglyceride level at first participant visit in mg/dL

variable.name: totchol_baseline
variable.description: Total cholesterol level at first participant visit in mg/dL

variable.name: lipid_med_baseline
variable.description: Any lipid lowering medication (statin or other) at first participant visit

variable.name: sbp_baseline
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure (SBP) at first participant visit (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: dbp_baseline
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (DBP) at first participant visit (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: htn_status_baseline
variable.description: Hypertension status at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: htn_med_baseline
variable.description: Hypertension med status (any) at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: angioplasty_baseline
variable.description: History of angioplasty at first visit (0/1)

variable.name: cabg_baseline
variable.description: History of coronary artery bypass (CABG) at first visit (0/1)

variable.name: mi_baseline
variable.description: History of myocardial infarction (MI) recorded at first participant visit (0/1).

variable.name: mi_during_followup
variable.description: 0/1 to indicate that a myocardial infarction (MI) occurred during study follow up. 0 if no MI during study follow up. 1 if an adjudicated MI occurred during study follow up (even if baseline MI status was 1).

variable.name: mi_tte_or_censor
variable.description: Time to event variable for myocardial infarction (MI). Time (in days) from start of study to MI for event that occurred during study follow up; and follow up time for those that did not have an MI during study follow up.

variable.name: stroke_baseline
variable.description: History of stroke at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: stroke_during_followup
variable.description: 0/1 to indicate that a stroke occurred during study follow up. 0 if no stroke during study follow up. 1 if an adjudicated stroke occurred during study follow up.

variable.name: stroke_tte_or_censor
variable.description: Time to event variable for stroke. Time (in days) from start of study to stroke for event that occurred during study follow up; and follow up time for those that did not have an adjudicated stroke during study follow up.

variable.name: chf_baseline
variable.description: History of congestive heart failure (CHF) at first participant visit

variable.name: afib_baseline
variable.description: History of atrial fibrillation at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: afib_during_followup
variable.description: 0/1 to indicate that an atrial fibrillation occurred during study follow up. 0 if no afib during study follow up. 1 if an adjudicated afib occurred during study follow up.

variable.name: afib_tte_or_censor
variable.description: Time to event variable for atrial fibrillation. Time (in days) from start of study to afib for event that occurred during study follow up; and follow up time for those that did not have an afib during study follow up

variable.name: death
variable.description: 0/1 to indicate that the participant died during study follow up

variable.name: death_tte_or_censor
variable.description: Time to death or censoring time. Time (in days) from start of study to death for participants that died during study follow up; and follow up time for those that did not die during study follow up

variable.name: current_smoker_baseline
variable.description: Current smoking status at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: former_smoker_baseline
variable.description: Former smoking status at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: age_at_menarche
variable.description: Age in years at menarche (start of menstruation)

variable.name: fasting_insulin
variable.description: Blood fasting insulin at first participant visit in uU/mL. (Note that there are some extreme outliers)

variable.name: age_at_fasting_insulin
variable.description: Age at fasting insulin

variable.name: fasting_glucose
variable.description: Blood fasting glucose at first participant visit in mg/dL

variable.name: age_at_fasting_glucose
variable.description: Age at fasting glucose

variable.name: apoa1
variable.description: Apolipoprotein A1 measurement in mg/L at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_apoa1
variable.description: Age in years at Apolipoprotein A1 measurement

variable.name: apob
variable.description: Apolipoprotein B measurement in mg/L at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_apob
variable.description: Age in years at Apolipoprotein B measurement

variable.name: fibrinogen
variable.description: Fibrinogen level in mg/dL at first designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_fibrinogen
variable.description: Age in years at Fibrinogen measurement

variable.name: factorVII
variable.description: Factor VII level in % at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_factorVII
variable.description: Age in years at Factor VII measurement

variable.name: factorVIII
variable.description: Factor VIII level in % at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_factorVIII
variable.description: Age in years at Factor VIII measurement

variable.name: vWF
variable.description: VWF level in % at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_vWF
variable.description: Age in years at visit of hemostatic factors measurement

variable.name: crp
variable.description: C-reactive protein level in mg/L at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_crp
variable.description: Age in years at CRP measurement

variable.name: il6
variable.description: IL6 level in pg/mL at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_il6
variable.description: Age in years at IL6 measurement

variable.name: icam1
variable.description: ICAM1 level in ng/mL at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_icam1
variable.description: Age in years at ICAM1 measurement

variable.name: pselectin
variable.description: P-selectin level at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_pselectin
variable.description: Age in years at P-selectin measurement

variable.name: wbc
variable.description: White blood count in x1,000/cubic mm at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_wbc
variable.description: Age in years at WBC measurement

variable.name: hemoglobin
variable.description: Hemoglobin at designated visit (may not be from first visit) in g/dl

variable.name: age_at_hemoglobin
variable.description: Age in years at hemoglobin measurement

variable.name: hematocrit
variable.description: Hematocrit at designated visit (may not be from first visit) in %

variable.name: age_at_hematocrit
variable.description: Age in years at hematocrit measurement

variable.name: mean_corpuscular_volume
variable.description: Mean corpuscular volume in femtoliters at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: platelet_count
variable.description: Platelet count at designated visit (may not be from first visit) in x 1000/cubic mm

variable.name: age_at_platelet_count
variable.description: Age in years at platelet count measurement

variable.name: age_at_mcv
variable.description: Agein years at mean corpuscular volume measurement

variable.name: red_blood_count
variable.description: Red blood cell count (RBC) in million cells per microliter at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_rbc
variable.description: Age in years at red blood cell count measurement

variable.name: neutrophils
variable.description: Neutrophils in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: monocytes
variable.description: Monocytes in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: lymphocytes
variable.description: Lymphocytes in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: eosinophils
variable.description: Eosinophils in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: basophils
variable.description: Basophils in absolute numbers at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: age_at_2nd_blood_counts
variable.description: Age in years at secondary blood count measurements (MCV, RBC, Neutrophils, Monocytes, Lymphocytes, Eosinophils, Basophils)

variable.name: imt_meanmean_farwall_cca
variable.description: Average far wall thickness of the right and left common carotid mean intima media thickness (IMT) values, using as many views as are available for a given study

variable.name: imt_meanmean_farwall_ica
variable.description: Average far wall thickness of the right and left internal carotid maximum intima media thickness IMT values, using as many views as are available for a given study

variable.name: age_at_imt
variable.description: Age in years at intima media thickness (IMT) measurement

variable.name: ekg_qrs
variable.description: QRS interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: ekg_qt
variable.description: QT interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: ekg_pr
variable.description: PR interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: ekg_hr
variable.description: HR interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be from first visit)

variable.name: lvh_at_ekg
variable.description: Left ventriculat hypertrophy status at first participant visit (0/1)

variable.name: wpw_or_avblock2_at_ekg
variable.description: Indicator (0/1) for Wolff-Parkinson-White pattern or second degree AV Block at EKG visit

variable.name: cornell_voltage_ekg
variable.description: Cornell voltage for EKG measurement

variable.name: age_at_ekg
variable.description: Age in years at EKG visit

variable.name: fev1_first_avail_visit
variable.description: Forced expiratory volume (FEV1) measurement at the first available visit

variable.name: fvc_first_avail_visit
variable.description: Forced vital capacity (FVC) measurement at the first available visit

variable.name: age_lung_function
variable.description: Age in years at lung function (FEV1 and FVC) measurements
